name: Ranger Danger - Prototype
description:
A game prototype where you (as a ranger(currently dinosaur)) have to clear out the path of boxes and trees to make way for your car. It's done with rex engine by sky tyrranosaur, and currently using placeholder art. 

By Sofie Schmidt, Nikolaj Munk and Gertrud Agger (KADK, Copenhagen Students) 

Google Questionnaire After Completion 

(thank you!): https://forms.gle/yHEqSQmW9cJZPnoLA

------------------------------------------------------------

Controls 

Move - A/D (left/right)

Push/Pull - P

Chop(trees) - G 

Jump - Space
